programme.title: Squalo deixa Giorno fora de combate. Narancia usa a habilidade de radar de seu Stand Aerosmith para localizar e destruir a ameaça que se aproxima.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Sozinha na cabine e sob ataque, Trish recebe a ajuda repentina de uma entidade que se autodenomina Spicy Lady, seu próprio Stand.

programme.title: Em uma missão para localizar Trish na Sardenha a pedido do chefe, o leal subordinado Doppio encontra o traidor Risotto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Uma historinha do passado – "Meu Nome é Doppio"

programme.title: Ao perceber que Doppio é mais do que um simples membro de Passione, Risotto o ataca sistematicamente com a habilidade magnética de seu Stand, Metallic.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Decidido a identificar seu chefe, Abbacchio ativa seu Stand para revelar quem fotografou a mãe de Trish 15 anos antes.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Sob um céu que pode desabar a qualquer momento

programme.title: Depois de receber uma informação anônima sobre a identidade do chefe e como derrotá-lo, Bucciarati e sua equipe vão a Roma encontrar a pessoa que fez a ligação.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para fugir do Stand carnívoro de Cioccolata, Green Tea, Bucciarati e Mista tentam arrumar um carro, mas Secco está determinado a impedir a fuga.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Cioccolata tenta eliminar civis inocentes com seu Stand usando um helicóptero, mas Giorno e Mista decidem derrubá-lo antes.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para impedir que Secco chegue ao Coliseu antes, Bucciarati o atrai para um duelo sob as ruas de Roma.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Ferido demais para perceber quem o está ajudando, Bucciarati é levado ao Coliseu por Doppio, que revela sua verdadeira identidade à pessoa que o está esperando.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando Emperor Crimson é disparado contra Polnareff, o Silver Chariot é perfurado pela flecha. Quem está dentro do Coliseu adormece de forma misteriosa.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Com as almas trocadas entre si, Mista e os outros têm que dar um jeito de recuperar a flecha antes que Diavolo fique com ela.

programme.title: Quando Requiem provoca mutação nas entidades ao seu redor, Giorno conclui que a alma de Diavolo deve estar possuindo um dos membros de sua equipe.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Apesar de seus esforços, a flecha cai nas mãos de Diavolo. Mas antes que o chefe possa perfurar seu próprio Stand com ela, Bucciarati intervém.

programme.title: Ao investigar o suposto suicídio da filha do florista, Mista se depara com um usuário de Stand chamado Scolippi.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Após a morte de seu pai, Dio Brando entra para uma família aristocrática e jura para si mesmo que vai deixar o herdeiro deles, Jonathan “JoJo” Joestar, sem nada.

programme.title: JoJo conhece um líder de gangue chamado Speedwagon quando vai a Londres investigar o envenenamento de seu pai.

programme.title: JoJo e seus companheiros são emboscados por Dio e uma horda de zumbis depois de serem atraídos até um cemitério por um garoto chamado Poco.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O lendário cavaleiro Blueford ressuscita e confia sua espada a JoJo. Tarkus ataca JoJo com força avassaladora.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Zeppeli ataca Tarkus, mesmo sabendo de seu destino terrível. Em um último ato de coragem, ele usa as forças que lhe restam para repassar seus poderes ao sucessor, JoJo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo resgata a irmã de Poco. Dire, um amigo de Zeppeli, bate de frente com Dio. Com a espada de Blueford nas mãos, JoJo volta a enfrentar Dio.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo e Erina embarcam em um cruzeiro para a lua de mel. Mas, para o espanto de JoJo, uma pessoa ligada a Dio aparece a bordo do navio.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O ano é 1938. Em uma ruína mexicana, diversas máscaras de pedra são descobertas. Na cidade de Nova York, um jovem chamado Smokey recebe a ajuda de Joseph, o neto de JoJo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph enfrenta Straizo, que virou vampiro após trair seu amigo Speedwagon. Terminada a batalha, Straizo avisa sobre o Homem do Pilar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph é atacado por um dos homens de Stroheim na chegada ao México. Stroheim tenta despertar Santviento, o Homem do Pilar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph usa seu poder para tentar fugir de Santviento. Quando isso não dá certo, ele tenta expor seu inimigo à luz do sol para se salvar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph e Speedwagon conhecem Caesar, neto de Zeppeli, quando chegam a Roma após a descoberta de que existem outros Homens do Pilar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Homem do Pilar Wamuu fere Caesar Zeppeli durante uma luta feroz. Joseph revela a nova técnica que desenvolveu em segredo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Crônicas da Tribo Fantasma, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Quando fósseis gigantes são descobertos perto da Mongólia, uma expedição é organizada para analisá-los. Quando uma explosão deixa os membros da equipe de escavação enterrados no subsolo, eles descobrem um templo ciclópico e bestas gigantes antigas.

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin: Cavaleiros de Camelot, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Um Rei Arthur muito mais velho retorna para casa após lutar contra o Império Romano. Seu filho ilegítimo corrompeu o trono de Camelot. Agora o Rei Arthur deve se reunir com o mago Merlin e os Cavaleiros da Távola Redonda e lutar para recuperar sua coroa.

programme.title: Arn: O Cavaleiro Templário, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Arn foi criado com o objetivo de ser um monge e um bravo guerreiro. Ao deixar sua terra, em meio à guerra entre cristãos e muçulmanos, ele conhece Cecília e se apaixona, porém Arn é enviado para lutar na Terra Santa como um cavaleiro templário.

programme.title: Thor: Deus do Trovão, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: O inescrupuloso Loki escapou de Asgard e está à procura de Yggdrasil, a árvore que contém toda a força do universo. Ele planeja destruí-la e replantá-la à sua imagem e semelhança.

programme.title: Um Conto Sobre o Tempo, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Neste conto de fadas, Urban é um aprendiz de relojoeiro que segue os passos de seu corajoso mestre, Apbán, e parte em uma ousada jornada para encontrar um relógio com o poder de avisar a quem o possui sobre sua própria morte.

programme.title: O Garoto Formiga 3, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: A Exofarm tem um novo CEO e quer controlar o mundo. Antboy, um menino de 12 anos, Pelle, que é mordido por uma formiga e desenvolve superpoderes, tenta impedi-la.

programme.title: As Aventuras de K9, Lenda do Ouro Perdido, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Kassie, seus amigos e o cão policial Scoot estão em uma grande aventura quando um estranho relógio de bolso cai em suas mãos e os leva a desvendar o mistério de um tesouro perdido.

programme.title: Congo, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Quando uma expedição desaparece no Congo, um grupo é enviado para procura-la, em uma aventura cheia de acontecimentos, tecnologia e muito suspense.

programme.title: Em Defesa do Paraíso, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Preso no tumulto quando inimigos começam ataques contra a cidade de New Haven, Alec se junta à equipe que forma a pequena linha de defesa.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capitão da polícia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man é perseguido por um gângster vingativo, enquanto o exército japonês invade a região.

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemático disfarçado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacável. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se vê lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua família.

programme.title: Dragões para Sempre, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie é contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as águas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.​

programme.title: Sangue Oposto, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Dmitri e James, dois poderosos assassinos de elite contratados pelo governo, se reconectam após seu último trabalho no Sudeste Asiático.

programme.title: O Monge à Prova de Balas, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a história de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: Aliança Mortal, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Um grande carregamento de drogas desaparece entre a fronteira Canadá-Estados Unidos. Os traficantes de drogas que o procuram obrigam um guarda florestal, um ex-membro das Forças Especiais, a ajudá-los a encontrar a droga.

programme.title: O Retorno do Dragão - A Cidade Perdida, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Segundo uma lenda milenar chinesa, a cada 60 anos uma forte tempestade de areia revelará o local onde um tesouro sagrado que estava perdido está localizado, a região de Dragon Gate.

programme.title: Fora do Rumo, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notório criminoso chinês.

programme.title: Moby Dick, (1956, Action)
programme.desc: This stellar retelling of Melville's classic is unsurpassed in entertainment, imagination and high adventure. Consumed by an insane rage, Captain Ahab (Gregory Peck) has but one purpose in life - revenge on the great white whale who disfigured him.

programme.title: Birdman of Alcatraz, (1962, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Burt Lancaster stars in the true story of killer Robert Stroud, who spent 43 years in solitary confinement at Alcatraz, and who educated himself, becoming a world renowned authority on birds. Thelma Ritter, Telly Savalas and Karl Malden co-star.

programme.title: The Defiant Ones, (1958, Thriller)
programme.desc: In Stanley Kramer's cinema classic, screen legends Sidney Poitier and Tony Curtis star as two convicts on the run from a Southern work gang who are bound together by an unbreakable iron chain and separated by an unbridled hatred for each other.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night, (1967, Crime)
programme.desc: Sidney Poitier and Rod Steiger (who won a Best Actor Oscar® for his performance) shine in this classic mystery-thriller that took home five Academy Awards®, including Best Picture and Best Adapted Screenplay. Lee Grant and Warren Oates also star.

programme.title: Marty, (1955, Romance)
programme.desc: Ernest Borgnine won a Best Actor Oscar for his role as a Bronx butcher who gives up on love, until he meets an equally lonely school teacher in this charming story that garnered a total of four Oscars including Best Picture.

programme.title: The Night of the Hunter, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert Mitchum stars in an unforgettable role as a psychopathic preacher in the relentless pursuit of two children who have their dead father's stolen fortune hidden in a doll. Shelley Winters co-stars.

programme.title: 12 Angry Men, (1957, Courtroom Drama)
programme.desc: Eleven jurors are convinced that the defendant is guilty of murder. The twelfth has no doubt of his innocence. How can this one man steer the others toward the same conclusion? Henry Fonda and Lee J. Cobb lead the all-star cast in this classic!

programme.title: Witness for the Prosecution, (1958, Thriller)
programme.desc: Tyrone Power, Marlene Dietrich, and Charles Laughton star in this exceptional courtroom Drama about a young man on trial for a wealthy widow's murder after he suspiciously profits from her will.

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.title: Rambo III, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join his friend and former mentor, Colonel Trautman, on a mission to Afghanistan. The mission fails and Trautman is captured by Russian troops. Now Rambo must infiltrate the Russian fortress to save his only friend.

programme.title: Death Warrant, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude van Damme ("Bloodsport", "Cyborg") is a veteran undercover cop posing as an inmate in a dangerously corrupt state prison.

programme.title: Walking Tall, (2004, Crime)
programme.desc: Chris Vaughn, a retired soldier who returns to his hometown only to discover the place he grew up is now overrun with crime, drugs and violence. Enlisting the help of his old pal, Chris gets elected Sheriff and fights to clean up his hometown.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: Rambo III, (1988, Action)

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is Ichabod Crane, an investigator determined to stop the murderous Headless Horseman.

programme.title: Don't Be Afraid of the Dark, (2010, Horror)
programme.desc: Sally moves to Rhode Island to live with her father and his new girlfriend in their 19th-century mansion. While exploring the house, Sally starts to hear voices coming from creatures in the basement whose hidden agenda is to claim her as one of their own.

programme.title: The Craft, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Sarah has always been different. So as the new girl at St. Benedict's Academy, she immediately falls in with the high school outsiders. But these girls won't settle for being powerless misfits.

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is Ichabod Crane, an investigator determined to stop the murderous Headless Horseman.

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.title: Vacancy, (2007, Horror)
programme.desc: A suspenseful, classic thriller, in the tradition of Alfred Hitchcock, starring Luke Wilson and Kate Beckinsale, that will keep you on the edge of your seat and your heart pounding! Rated: R

programme.title: Silent Hill, (2005, Horror)
programme.desc: Based on the best-selling horror action game, Silent Hill stars Radha Mitchell (Man on Fire) as Rose, a desperate mother who takes her adopted daughter, Sharon, to the town of Silent Hill in an attempt to cure her of her ailment. Rating: R

programme.title: Silent Hill: Revelation, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: On the eve of her 18th birthday, plagued by terrifying nightmares and her father's disappearance, Heather discovers she is not who she thinks she is. The revelation leads her deep into a demonic world that threatens to trap her in Silent Hill forever.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Bruno and team make an emergency landing in Sardegna where the Hitman Team leader, Risotto, is also determined to uncover a certain mystery. Doppio, a timid, wide-eyed teen, the result of a seemingly impossible pregnancy, has his own goals on the island.
programme.sub-title: A Little Story From the Past ~My Name Is Doppio~

programme.title: City Hunter 2

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: By revealing to each other a fearless embrace of the unknown, Giorno and Mista emerge victorious against Ghiaccio. Now, a single member of Bruno’s group must face a single bell tower, a single elevator shaft, and a single menacing task.
programme.sub-title: The Final Mission From the Boss

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Peer into the complex personal pasts of Bucciarati and his fellow gang members, and uncover the thread that unites this diverse group of fighters into a single team and single expression of resolve.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Bruno and team, now self-chosen traitors, learn from Trish during a moment of calm at a Venetian café a trip to Sardegna is vital. Chaos, then, erupts as Narancia loses his tongue and ability to speak the truth.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: As Giorno is teleported between puddles with Squalo’s shark attached firmly to his jugular, Narancia tries to sniff out the perpetrator using his CO2 tracer but is inhibited by Tiziano’s tongue-fusing Stand, frustrating himself and Bruno’s team.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tanya finds her summer plans canceled when her mom jets off for a last-minute retreat and the elderly babysitter who arrives at her door unexpectedly passes away.

programme.title: Head of State, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: When Washington desperately needs a presidential candidate just weeks before the election, they need someone sure to lose. They pick Mays Gilliam (Chris Rock), an unknown local politician from a down-and-out D.C. neighborhood, to be their puppet.

programme.desc: Death at a Funeral is a hilarious day in the life of an American family come together to put a beloved husband and father to rest.

programme.desc: The story of a down-and-out con artist who trades lifestyles with a well-to-do investor.

programme.title: Two Can Play That Game, (2001, African-American Romance)
programme.desc: A sassy, confident woman must use all her wiles to have any hope of bringing her man back . . . while keeping her pride intact.

programme.title: Concussion, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: The true story of Dr. Bennet Omalu, the forensic neuropathologist who first discovered the existence of CTE in a professional football player and who worked tirelessly to raise public awareness.

programme.title: Baby Assassins 2, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: After the agency suspends its top assassins, aspiring hitmen decide to eliminate them—leading to a lightning-fast showdown between trained killers.

programme.title: Bad City, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: In poverty-stricken Kaiko City, a corrupt mayoral candidate eliminates rival mafias, prompting a released ex-cop to lead a treacherous battle for justice with a special task force in the gritty underworld.

programme.title: One-Percent Warrior, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: After his devastatingly fast, samurai-style combat approach sets filmmakers against him, a legendary action star (Tak Sakaguchi) films his own movie—on turf claimed by feuding yakuza gangs, including Japan’s deadliest martial arts assassin.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Ma dreams of making a life in Shanghai without using his fist. But when he befriends the Boss of a rival gang, he must fight for honor or lose everything.

programme.title: Bangkok Dog, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Special agent Andrew Kang intercepts a drug shipment and goes undercover in Bangkok's criminal underworld. Posing as a cartel operative, he must gain the gang's trust, but as the lines blur, he risks losing himself—and his way out.

programme.title: Ip Man, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Ip Man is the award-winning film adaptation about the life story of Ip Man, the grandmaster of the Wing Chun style of kung fu and sifu of legendary martial arts superstar, Bruce Lee.

programme.title: Ip Man 2, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Newly arrived in Hong Kong, martial arts instructor Ip Man encounters stiff opposition when he begins teaching the Wing Chun fighting style. But instead of bowing to his rivals' demands, he perseveres and retaliates with amazing speed and power.

programme.title: Ip Man 3, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: In this explosive third installment of the blockbuster martial arts series, when a band of brutal gangsters led by crooked property developer (Mike Tyson) make a play to take over the city, Master Ip is forced to take a stand.

programme.title: Young IP Man, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: In 1917 young Ip Man first came to Hong Kong to study, but his peaceful campus life was unexpectedly broken. A shocking hostage situation occurred on the day when the school held an English speech contest.

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral, (1994, Romance)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop, (1984, Comedy)

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ace Ventura Pet Detective is on the case to find the Miami Dolphins' missing mascot and quarterback Dan Marino. He goes eye to eye with sharks, stakes out the Miami Dolphins and woos and wows the ladies. He always gets his man...or beast.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Africa's the place where Ace is on the case, setting out to rescue an animal he loathes - a bat! If you're ready to laugh like a pack of hyenas, if you want more fun than an industrial-sized barrel of monkeys, you'll know what to do. Heed the call.

programme.title: Autumn in New York, (2000, Romance)
programme.desc: Autumn in New York follows the sexual exploits of Will Keane (RICHARD GERE) until he runs into an unexpected dead end when he meets Charlotte Fielding (WINONA RYDER). Charlotte is half Will's age and twice his match.

programme.title: Legends of the Fall, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: 1994 Oscar Winner: Best Cinematography. Based on the novella by Jim Harrison, this sweeping romantic epic is about the Ludlow brothers--two men (Brad Pitt, Aidan Quinn) in love with the same woman (Julia Ormond). Rated: R

programme.title: Sliding Doors, (1998, Romance)
programme.desc: The split-second moments that can take a life down one path instead of another form the tantalizing 'what if?' in this delightful romantic comedy starring Gwyneth Paltrow.

programme.title: Already Tomorrow in Hong Kong, (2016, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Ruby and Josh spent an unforgettable night together in Hong Kong a year ago, and now their brief encounter is about to get a second chance.

programme.title: Boys And Girls, (2000, Romance)
programme.desc: Ryan (Freddie Prinze, Jr.) and Jennifer (Claire Forlani) couldn't be more different. As kids, they couldn't stand one another. As adults, it's their differences that bind them together in this fun RomCom from the director of SHE'S ALL THAT.

programme.title: No Strings Attached, (2011, Romance)
programme.desc: A hilarious story about Emma and Adam who set up a seemingly perfect arrangement with each other based soley on sex and having only one cardinal rule: No Strings Attached.

programme.title: 40 Days and 40 Nights, (2002, Romance)
programme.desc: After a brutal break-up, a young man vows to stay celibate during the forty days of Lent, but finds the girl of his dreams and is unable to do anything about it.

programme.title: Friends with Benefits, (2011, Romance)
programme.desc: A young man and woman decide to take their friendship to the next level without becoming a couple, but soon discover that adding sex only leads to complications.

programme.title: No Strings Attached, (2011, Romance)
programme.desc: A hilarious story about Emma and Adam who set up a seemingly perfect arrangement with each other based soley on sex and having only one cardinal rule: No Strings Attached.

programme.title: Shattered, (2006, Thriller)
programme.desc: When his daughter is kidnapped, Neil (Gerard Butler) must take matters into his own hands to get her back. Also starring Pierce Brosnan and Maria Bello.

programme.title: The Dead Zone, (1983, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic detective ability.

programme.title: Terminal, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two assassins carrying out a sinister mission, a teacher battling a fatal illness, an enigmatic janitor and a waitress leading a dangerous double life.

programme.title: Lord of War, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Oscar winner Nicolas Cage stars in this taut, action-packed tale of a notorious arms dealer who sold weapons to dictators and successfully outran the law for nearly twenty years.

programme.title: The Dead Zone, (1983, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic detective ability.

programme.title: Disturbia, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Living under three months' house arrest, Kale Brecht (Shia LaBeouf, Transformers) passes his days spying on the neighbors. It's all fun and games until things take a horrifying turn for the worse.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Basic Instinct, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: San Francisco detective Nick Curran is investigating the murder of a once-celebrated rock star, and he's made a few unsettling discoveries: a bloody ice pick, a white silk scarf tied to a bedpost, and evidence of an otherwise romantic evening.

programme.title: Man in the Moon, (1991, Romance)
programme.desc: The heartwarming coming-of-age film set in the 1950s stars Reese Witherspoon as a 14-year-old girl who gets her first difficult lesson in love.

programme.title: Proof, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: Oscar-winners Gwyneth Paltrow and Anthony Hopkins star in this powerful story of a young woman haunted by her father's past and the shadow of her own future. Based on the Pulitzer Prize-winning play, PROOF also stars Jake Gyllenhaal and Hope Davis.

programme.title: The Company Men, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: Three men must redefine their lives when they go from living the American dream to being “downsized.” Starring Oscar® winners Ben Affleck, Chris Cooper, and Tommy Lee Jones.

programme.title: Fargo, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Things go awry when car salesman Jerry Lundegaard (William H. Macy) hires two thugs to kidnap his wife. Soon, the very pregnant and chipper Police Chief Marge Gunderson (Frances McDormand) takes the case. Is she up for the challenge? You betcha.

programme.title: The Last Castle, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: His service to his country made him a hero. One mistake made him a prisoner. For General Eugene Irwin (Redford), It's just a matter of serving out his sentance - until he makes the shocking discovery that his fellow inmates are being murdered.

programme.title: Legends of the Fall, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: 1994 Oscar Winner: Best Cinematography. Based on the novella by Jim Harrison, this sweeping romantic epic is about the Ludlow brothers--two men (Brad Pitt, Aidan Quinn) in love with the same woman (Julia Ormond). Rated: R

programme.title: World Trade Center, (2006, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage and Michael Peña star as two New York City Port Authority policemen who were trapped in the rubble of September 11, 2001.

programme.title: Big Fish, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Throughout his life, Edward Bloom (Ewan McGregor) has always been a man of big appetites, enormous passions and tall tales.

programme.title: American Outlaws, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: When a Midwest town learns that a corrupt railroad baron has captured the deeds to their homesteads without their knowledge, young ranchers join forces to take back what is rightfully theirs.

programme.title: All the Pretty Horses, (2000, Romance)
programme.desc: Always wanting to live the cowboy lifestyle, young John Grady (Damon) sets off for a Hacienda in Mexico. While there, John enters into a passionate romance with the spellbinding Alejandra (Cruz), much to the displeasure of her powerful father.

programme.title: Quigley Down Under, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: A self-assured American sharpshooter moves to Australia in search of employment and finds work for a despotic land baron in the Australian outback.

programme.title: Posse, (1993, Western)
programme.desc: There's action galore in this off-beat western that features a group of mostly black infantrymen who return from the Spanish-American War with a cache of gold. The men travel to the West where their leader searches for the men who lynched his father.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: John Sturges' The Hallelujah Trail, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Chaos reigns on the wide open plains as a host of stars, including Burt Lancaster and Lee Remick, have their eyes set on a shipment of whiskey and let loose in this wild comedy that spoofs nearly every convention of movie westerns.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dollars, (1967, Action)
programme.desc: The Man With No Name (Clint Eastwood) receives offers from two gangs terrorizing a small town and accepts both, setting in motion a plan to destroy the criminals in a series of brilliantly orchestrated setups, showdowns, and deadly confrontations.

programme.title: For A Few Dollars More, (1967, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood returns as the Man With No Name, who teams up with equally lethal Colonel Mortimer (Lee Van Cleef) in pursuit of a sadistic killer and his band of desperadoes in this non-stop action classic from legendary director Sergio Leone.

programme.title: The Man in the Iron Mask, (1998, Action)

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events, (2004, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A thrilling misadventure involving three ingenious orphans and a villainous actor named Count Olaf (Jim Carrey) who wants their enormous fortune.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: To his family and friends, Cody Banks is a typical teen. But Cody has a secret - he's actually part of an undercover teen CIA program and has 5 years of special training under his belt.

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events, (2004, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A thrilling misadventure involving three ingenious orphans and a villainous actor named Count Olaf (Jim Carrey) who wants their enormous fortune.

programme.title: Timeline, (2003, Action)

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)

programme.title: The Hustle, (2019, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two incorrigible scam artists -- one low rent and the other high class -- compete to swindle a naïve tech prodigy out of his vast fortune.

programme.title: Mr. Mom, (1983, Comedy)
programme.desc: Michael Keaton plays a husband and father who loses his job as an engineer at the auto manufacturing plant. After struggling to find another job, his wife lands a high-paying position at an advertising agency.

programme.title: Big Fish, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Throughout his life, Edward Bloom (Ewan McGregor) has always been a man of big appetites, enormous passions and tall tales.

programme.title: American Outlaws, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: When a Midwest town learns that a corrupt railroad baron has captured the deeds to their homesteads without their knowledge, young ranchers join forces to take back what is rightfully theirs.

programme.title: The First Wives Club, (1996, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Join the Club - The First Wives Club, the good-time battle-of-the-sexes satire sparked by snappy one-liners, great physical-comedy gags and three unforgettable stars in top form, Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn and Diane Keaton.

programme.title: Grease, (1978, Musical)
programme.desc: Grease is the one that you want! Go back to high school with Pink Lady Sandy (Olivia Newton-John), leader of the bad-boy T-Birds, Danny (John Travolta), and a rockin' and rollin' all-star cast.

programme.title: Annie, (2014, Musical)
programme.desc: A foster kid, who lives with her mean foster mom, sees her life change when business tycoon and New York mayoral candidate Will Stacks makes a thinly-veiled campaign move and takes her in.

programme.title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: The comic "Bluntman and Chronic" is adapted for the big-screen by Hollywood without the permission of the real-life stoner icons of CLERKS— Jay and Silent Bob.

programme.title: Saved!, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: Good girl Mary (Jena Malone) can't believe it when she gets pregnant by her newly-gay boyfriend. She also can't believe the actions of her popular, relentlessly devout best friend, Hilary Faye (Mandy Moore).

programme.title: Donnie Darko (Theatrical Cut), (2001, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

programme.title: Saving Silverman, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Darren, Wayne and J.D. have been inseparable since grade school. However, their friendship is put to the test when Darren meets Judith, a young lady with the looks of an angel and the demeanor of the devil himself.

programme.title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: The comic "Bluntman and Chronic" is adapted for the big-screen by Hollywood without the permission of the real-life stoner icons of CLERKS— Jay and Silent Bob.

programme.title: Memento, (2000, Thriller)

programme.title: Quarantine, (2008, Drama)

programme.title: Devon, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: Years after Devon disappeared, a mysterious website draws five adventurers to the abandoned asylum where she was last seen. Armed with cameras, they plunge into the darkness, unaware they’re filming their own descent into horror—never meant to return.

programme.title: A Message from Brianna, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: A Message from Brianna

programme.title: The Reading, (2023, Thriller)

programme.title: Cell, (2016, Thriller)

programme.title: Stephen King's Thinner, (1996, Horror)

programme.title: Manhunter, (1986, Thriller)
programme.desc: Using his uncanny ability to get inside psychopaths' minds, former FBI agent, Will Graham, returns to action to hunt down a serial killer.

programme.title: Jagged Edge, (1985, Thriller)
programme.desc: A grisly homicide, a sensational trial, a forbidden affair it's JAGGED EDGE, a razor-sharp suspense thriller about crime, punishment and passion. Jeff Bridges is the prime suspect and Glenn Close plays the attorney who falls in love with him. rated -R

programme.title: Black Rain, (1989, Action)

programme.title: Raging Bull, (2020, Biographical Drama)

programme.title: Jagged Edge, (1985, Thriller)

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Action)

programme.title: Find Me Guilty, (2006, Drama)

programme.title: Fargo, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Things go awry when car salesman Jerry Lundegaard (William H. Macy) hires two thugs to kidnap his wife. Soon, the very pregnant and chipper Police Chief Marge Gunderson (Frances McDormand) takes the case. Is she up for the challenge? You betcha.

programme.title: Henry's Crime, (2010, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Released from prison for a crime he didn't commit, an ex-con targets the same bank he was sent away for robbing. Starring an ensemble cast including Keanu Reeves ("John Wick").

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Crime)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: Texas Killing Fields, (2011, Thriller)
programme.desc: In the Texas bayous, a local homicide detective (Worthington) teams up with a cop from New York City (Morgan) to investigate a series of unsolved murders. Based on true events.

programme.title: Hot Rod, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: A comedy about a stunt man who’s never successfully landed a jump without wiping out and his attempt to master the biggest stunt of his life.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.title: Major League, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians threatens to move the team unless they deliver immediate results. She then fills the roster with has-beens to guarantee their failure. But the team miraculously rallies together and starts to win.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.title: Major League, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians threatens to move the team unless they deliver immediate results. She then fills the roster with has-beens to guarantee their failure. But the team miraculously rallies together and starts to win.

programme.title: Stripes, (1981, Comedy)
programme.desc: Bill Murray has joined the Army, and the Army will never be the same! When John Winger (Murray) loses his job, his car, his apartment and his girlfriend, all in one day, he decides he only has one option: volunteer for Uncle Sam.

programme.desc: Michael Keaton and Andie MacDowell star in director Harold Ramis' brilliant comedy about a man who clones himself to save his marriage, and then almost loses his wife to himself! Keaton takes on four hilariously distinct roles.

programme.title: Coneheads, (1993, Science fiction)
programme.desc: One look, and you know they're from a very strange place. They're from New Jersey, by way of France, by way of far-off, far-out Remulak. They're Coneheads.

programme.title: High School High, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: From the creators of the Naked Gun series comes High School High. Richard C. Clark is an idealisticyoung teacher who leaves a position at a prestigious school headed by his own father to teach at Marion Barry High.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls, (1995, Comedy)

programme.title: The Cable Guy, (1996, Comedy)

programme.title: Coneheads, (1993, Science fiction)
programme.desc: One look, and you know they're from a very strange place. They're from New Jersey, by way of France, by way of far-off, far-out Remulak. They're Coneheads.

programme.title: Kingpin, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches.

programme.title: Boomerang, (1992, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Advertising executive Marcus Graham is a quintessential bachelor, Graham is never without a new lady on his arm. Enter Jacqueline, his new boss, and Marcus is on the receiving end of his own patented behavior for the first time!

programme.title: Brannigan, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: John Wayne stars as Chicago Police Lieutenant Jim Brannigan and Richard Attenborough co-stars as British policeman Cmdr. Swann in this action-comedy. Brannigan teams up in the U.K. with Cmdr Swann to escort a crime boss back to the U.S.

programme.title: The Killer Elite, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: James Caan and Robert Duvall star in Sam Peckinpah's tense, action-packed thriller that explores savagery and betrayal in the murky world of killers-for-hire.

programme.title: Comes a Horseman, (1978, Western)
programme.desc: Set in the American West of the 1940s, a pair of little-guy ranchers join forces against the depredations of a ruthless land baron determined to expand his empire at whatever cost. Starring Jane Fonda, James Caan, and Jason Robards.

programme.title: Buffalo Bill and the Indians, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Buffalo Bill has fought Indians & Civil War battles, but nothing can prepare him for show business! When he signs Sitting Bull for a role in his Wild West Show, the clash of cultures reverberates far beyond the boundaries of their sprawling theater.

programme.title: The Molly Maguires, (1970, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Life is rough in the coal mines of 1876 Pennsylvania. A group of Irish emigrant miners, known as the Molly Maguires, fights against the cruelty of the mining company with sabotage.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: Force 10 From Navarone, (1978, Action)
programme.desc: A group of allied commandos on a mission against the 3rd Reich has orders to blow a giant dam in order to crush a strategic bridge held by the Nazis.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Téa's body turns more and more into a giant popsicle, can she keep her brain from freezing to find a way to melt Big 2's strategy? Or will Big 2's penguin horde waddle all over her?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the judicial jerk Big 3 Johnson who takes the Deck Master form of Judge Man! How can Joey defeat a foe who can destroy Joey's monsters at will?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Just when Joey seems to gain the upper hand, he hits the longest streak of bad luck in the history of mankind! Has Joey's fortunes finally run out, or is a crooked judge ignoring the rules of the law?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 4 Nezbitt challenges Duke, Tristan, and Serenity for the right to gain control of three bodies at once! Will Serenity's errors cost her team the ultimate price when Tristan and Duke can't cover for her mistakes?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: One down, two to go! With the loss of Tristan, Serenity is heartbroken. Can she pull herself together and remember the lessons Tristan taught her to turn the duel around?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tristan's back... but he's not who he appears to be when he kidnaps Mokuba! It's time for Kaiba to stop monkeying around and rescue his brother, but he's confronted by Big 5 Leichter!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 5's Satellite Cannon attacks Kaiba's monsters from deep space! Mokuba's unwavering faith in Kaiba inspires him to believe that his brother will pull out the victory, but Noah has plans to ruin their brotherhood...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba arrives at Noah's sanctuary to rescue Mokuba, but Mokuba wants to stay with Noah! Has Mokuba seen the evil within Kaiba, or is something more sinister in the works?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah gives the Big Five one last chance to redeem themselves in a five-on-two tag team duel where Yugi and Joey take on the entire Big Five!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five concentrate their attack on Joey so that Yugi would be forced to duel all alone! Outmanned and overpowered, Yugi and Joey are near the end of the line!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five summon an almighty dragon that previously defeated Joey, Mai, and Mokuba! Joey and Yugi pull out all the stops, but is that enough to avoid their minds being scattered over virtual reality?
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel for control of KaibaCorp when Noah squares off against Kaiba! But can Kaiba fight at full strength after he learns the hidden truth about Noah... and the tragic past that made him what he is today?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah's Shinato's Ark steals monsters into its keep to use as an impenetrable wall of servants! How can Kaiba hurt Noah when Noah has an endless stream of monsters to protect himself with?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's about to finish Noah, but Mokuba protects Noah from his final blow! Will Kaiba sacrifice his beloved brother in exchange for freedom, or will the brotherly bond remain unbreakable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: For every turn that passes, one of Yugi's friends is transformed into stone! As more and more of his friends harden into solid rock, can Yugi defeat Noah before he runs out of turns and transforms into stone himself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are petrified into solid stone statues, but their spirits live on! Their combined souls energize Yugi into a noble fight, but is spirit going to win the duel when Yugi's not drawing the right cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has defeated Noah... but they still can't escape from the virtual world! The real reason behind their entrapment is revealed... as is the true villain pulling the strings!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Kaiba squares off against his stepfather Gozaburo for their final battle, Yugi and friends are attacked by endless hordes of monsters! Their only hope is Noah, but they can't expect help from their enemy... can they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Time is almost up before the missile's explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The clash of the two Egyptian God Monsters releases mystical energies that show Yugi and Kaiba visions of the ancient Egyptian past! What new answers do these images unlock, and what prophecies do they make for the future?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons three powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragons, but Yugi has no monsters remaining in his deck! Is losing only a matter of time, or will a long-dormant card from a fallen friend help turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba not only controls Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, but his Final Attack Orders card leaves Yugi with only three cards in his deck! If Yugi loses, he'll have to give up his chance to save the world from Marik's evil!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tired of Kaiba's insults, Joey challenges Kaiba for third place in the Battle City Tournament! Has Joey mastered enough strategies to take down the top dog, or is Kaiba going to wallop Joey like a pathetic puppy?

programme.title: The Heart Pirates head for the bottom of the ocean as Trafalgar Law prepares to operate on Luffy and Jimbei. Meanwhile, the arrival of Shanks brings the bloodshed to a sudden halt!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HERE COMES SHANKS! THE WAR OF THE BEST IS FINALLY OVER!

programme.title: The world rejoices in the wake of Whitebeard's death, and a host of powerful pirates vie for his position. Meanwhile, Luffy's friends fear that Ace's death may be more than the rubber-man can handle – if he ever wakes up!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MIGHTY LEADERS FACE EACH OTHER DOWN! HERALDING THE 'NEW ERA'!

programme.title: Power-hungry pirates terrorize innocent citizens once protected by Whitebeard. Luffy's nightmarish awakening sends him on a reckless rampage that could land him in an early grave!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LANDING AT THE MAIDEN ISLAND! THE HARSH REALITY FALLS UPON LUFFY!

programme.title: One Piece X Toriko Crossover
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A flashback to the younger days of Luffy and Ace reveals their unusual upbringing under the not-so-watchful eye of villainous mountain bandits!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY AND ACE! THE STORY OF HOW THE BROTHERS MET!

programme.title: The flashback continues as Ace robs a ruthless gang of pirates, and Luffy is left to take the fall! Will Ace and his friend Sabo let Luffy be tortured to death - or will they risk their high seas dreams to save him?!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HERE COMES SABO! THE BOY AT THE GRAY TERMINAL!

programme.title: Ace and Sabo race to rescue Luffy from the clutches of a murderous gang of pirates! Sabo wants to grab Luffy and make a break for it, but Ace refuses to back down from a fight – even when he's outnumbered!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I WON'T RUN! ACE'S DESPERATE RESCUE OPERATION!

programme.title: When a nobleman recognizes Sabo in the streets, Luffy and Ace learn the painful secret of their friend's past. As a sign of solidarity, the three boys pledge to become pirates and hoist a toast to brotherhood!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO THE SEA SOMEDAY! THE PLEDGE OF THE THREE BRATS!

programme.title: After another beating from Garp, Luffy and his friends take to the jungle and build a pirate hideout at the top of an enormous tree. First order of business: booby trap the new place!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LEAVING THE DADAN FAMILY FOR GOOD?! THE KIDS' HIDEOUT HAS BEEN BUILT!

programme.title: Luffy and his friends vow to defeat the giant tiger that's been stealing their food. Ace gets angry when his father's identity is revealed. Sabo's parents hire pirates to track down their son!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY BECOMING AN APPRENTICE?! A MAN WHO FOUGHT AGAINST THE KING OF THE PIRATES!

programme.title: Luffy, Ace, and Sabo take pirate lessons from a mysterious old scallywag who just might know the secret to defeat the big tiger – and becoming a good captain!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BATTLE AGAINST THE BIG TIGER! WHO IS GOING TO BE CAPTAIN?!

programme.title: The brothers are captured by a gang of pirates, and Sabo is handed over to his noble father, where the boy quickly discovers a sinister plot to destroy Gray Terminal forever!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FREEDOM TAKEN AWAY! THE NOBLES' PLOT CLOSING IN ON THE BROTHERS!

programme.title: While flames spread across Gray Terminal, Sabo makes a desperate attempt to escape the trappings of his noble birth and save his brothers. Meanwhile, Luffy and Ace must fight to avoid an untimely end!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FIRE HAS BEEN SET! THE GRAY TERMINAL IN CRISIS!

programme.title: Luffy is spared from a fiery death by an unlikely rescuer, but Ace refuses to leave Gray Terminal until he settles the score with Bluejam. Meanwhile, Sabo makes waves with a last-ditch escape attempt!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: WHERE CAN FREEDOM BE FOUND? A SAD DEPARTURE OF A BOY!

programme.title: Luffy and Ace receive troubling reports of a Celestial attack on Sabo's ship. Ace is eager to seek out the responsible parties and exact revenge, but a letter from his absent brother tempers his eagerness to fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TAKE GOOD CARE OF HIM! A LETTER FROM THE BROTHER!

programme.title: In the wake of Sabo's death, Luffy and Ace grow stronger than ever by continuing their daily routine of nonstop fighting. As the years pass, each brother prepares to set sail in search of future adventures!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO LIVE UP TO THE PROMISE! DEPARTURES OF THEIR OWN!

programme.title: Garp takes a beating from a heartbroken mountain bandit, and a big blue friend helps Luffy drown his despair in the newfound desire to reunite with his mates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I WANT TO SEE THEM! LUFFY'S MOURNFUL CRY!

programme.title: One by one, the Straw Hats are crushed to learn the tragic fate of Fire Fist Ace. Despite their own unique problems, the crew members' thoughts immediately turn to their crestfallen captain.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: STRAW HATS IN SHOCK! THE BAD NEWS HAS REACHED THEM!

programme.title: Luffy is determined to reassemble his scattered crew, but a powerful old friend forces him to rethink his plans. Meanwhile, Usopp fights to escape an island that wants to have him for lunch!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: REUNITED WITH DARK KING RAYLEIGH! DECISION TIME FOR LUFFY!

programme.title: Desperate to reach Luffy, Nami risks her life to escape from an island of weather wizards. Meanwhile, Franky rides a carbonation high through the ice and snow in search of a seaworthy vessel!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BACK TO OUR CAPTAIN! A JAIL BREAK AT THE SKY ISLAND AND THE INCIDENT ON THE WINTER ISLAND!

programme.title: Zoro's escape attempt is thwarted by a gang of sword-slinging baboon bullies. Brook uses music to end a feud between irate islanders with unequal arms!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ENCOUNTER! THE GREAT SWORDSMAN MIHAWK! ZORO'S SELF-WILLED DEADLY STRUGGLE!

programme.title: Chopper hitches a ride on a giant bird, Luffy makes a shocking return to Marineford, and Sanji finds himself fighting the most beautiful man he's ever seen!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A DISASTER FOR SANJI! THE QUEEN'S RETURN TO THE KINGDOM!

programme.title: Luffy along with Jimbei and Dark King Rayleigh, cause quite the commotion upon their return to Marineford. Meanwhile, powerful pirates all across the globe wreak havoc on the innocent!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy hopes to send a message to his mates by way of a clue hidden in a newspaper article. Meanwhile, the Flying Fish Riders protect the Straw Hat's ship from scandalous scavengers!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: WITH HOPES IT WILL REACH MY FRIENDS! BIG NEWS SPREADING FAST!

programme.title: Trafalgar Law waits for the right moment to make his move, Blackbeard is pursued by powerful marines, and Chopper makes a surprising return to the land of gargantuan birds!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: PIRATES GET ON THE MOVE! ASTOUNDING NEW WORLD!

programme.title: Nami uses her feminine charms to learn about the New World weather. Franky moves into Dr. Vegapunk's laboratory, and Sanji must fight to stay out of a cute dress!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LIVING THROUGH HELL! SANJI'S FIGHT FOR HIS MANHOOD!

programme.title: The Straw Hats continue preparations for their voyage to the New World as Robin heads for a meeting with the Revolutionary Dragon. Usopp aspires to become King of the Snipers, and Zoro begs his mortal enemy to train him!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I WILL GET MUCH, MUCH STRONGER! ZORO'S PLEDGE TO HIS CAPTAIN!

programme.title: Dark King Rayleigh takes Luffy to a deadly, deserted island for two years of intense battle training! If the Straw Hat captain wants to survive in the New World, he'll have to hone his hidden powers!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY'S TRAINING BEGINS! TO THE PLACE WE PROMISED IN 2 YEARS!

programme.title: After two years of rigorous training, the new and improved Straw Hats make their way to Sabaody Archipelago, but their long-awaited reunion is spoiled by a villainous gang of imposters!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BEGINNING OF THE NEW CHAPTER! THE STRAW HATS REUNITED!

programme.title: Luffy picks a fight with himself, Chopper falls in with a dubious crowd of imitation pirates, and Zorro causes a commotion when he falls asleep on the wrong ship!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: AN EXPLOSIVE SITUATION! LUFFY VS. FAKE LUFFY!

programme.title: Chopper struggles to make sense of the changes his "friends" have undergone in the last two years, and the Navy mobilizes in an attempt to stop the pirate posers. Will the real Straw Hats please stand up?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE NAVY HAS SET OUT! THE STRAW HATS IN DANGER!

programme.title: Chopper and Usopp flip over Franky's new body, Brook must choose between rock-n-roll stardom and the life of a pirate, and Luffy wanders into a very dangerous crowd!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BIG GUNS ASSEMBLED! THE DANGER OF THE FAKE STRAW HATS!

programme.title: While the rest of the Straw Hats prepare to set sail, Luffy gets a chance to show off his new powers in a brutal throw down between notorious pirates, navy soldiers, and deadly Pacifistas!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BATTLE IS ON! SHOW THEM WHAT YOU GOT FROM TRAINING!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko has invited Lupin and company to a classical concert conducted by Kyoransky from the International Philharmonic. After they get a good look at Kyoransky's baton, studded with a a diamond worth at least 200 million yen.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin goes to prison intent on making Silver tell what he did with the loot, only to discover that a new top-of-the-line prison was built over the site where he hid the money. Will the operation to trade an execution for the recovery of the money succeed?
programme.sub-title: The Last Gift in Prison is Cup Ramen

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the Golden Bell, symbol of the monarchy of Beltenberg and precious tourist attraction. However, the bell that sparkles in the belfry is just a brass replica.
programme.sub-title: Fujiko, Men are A Sorry Lot!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Zenigata is taken hostage from ICPO headquarters. The terrorists demand to swap him with their boss Napoleon XI, but ICPO refuses. Since Zenigata is no further use to them, the terrorists are bound to kill him; but Lupin is to the rescue?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Smith Gang hit-man company was once the best in the business, but they're suffering now from tough competition. Though the company chairman Smith considers running TV ads to revive his business, he can't think of a good way to do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though Joe Spade was once a formidable hitman of renown and Jigen's sharpshooter coach, he now comes to beg for Jigen's help; he had gotten old, flubbed a hit contract, and is now on the run.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: ICPO Bureau Chief Jasmine is an able commissioner. She uses the governor to spur Zenigata into action, as she has a secret plan to arrest Lupin. But Jasmine's plan is to make this mission her very last at ICPO so she could get married.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Nightlight Mask murdered the Duke of Le Mond and stole his diamonds. ICPO is having trouble solving the case, so they induct mystery author Conan Dorill as a special inspector. Dorill deduces that the true identity of Nightlight Mask is Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On a night of thunder and rain, a man gives Lupin a doll. The next day there is a news report that a diamond called the Phoenix's Tear had been stolen. Lupin's been caught on security cameras, but he has no recollection of having done the deed.
programme.sub-title: When the Devil Calls to Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin's target is the Vatican Crown, located at the North Pole. He devises a plan to thwart pesky Fujiko, which is to relocate penguins at the South Pole to the North Pole.
programme.sub-title: Lupin's North Pole, South Pole Adventures

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The World Crime Prevention Devices Association has developed the "killer safe" that sent many safe crackers to their graves. But Lupin takes the challenge to steal what it guards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin crashes crime boss Markane's masquerade party, but the party was just a ruse to entrap Lupin. Lupin gets hung by rope in the dark and is made the target of Markane's murder game in ten rounds, of which players have to hit the target.
programme.sub-title: The Badder A Guy, The More Villainous He Is

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin gets called out to New York where he rescues a girl hunted by an organization called Red Spider. Lupin does everything he can to help the poor girl suffering from amnesia; he tries hypnosis on her but to no avail, he gets hypnotized instead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Old man Piccolo had taught Lupin the art of thievery 15 years ago. Learning that his widowed wife had all of her belongings impounded by the police, Lupin promises her to get them all back.
programme.sub-title: The Merry Widow and the Robber's Quartette

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew sneak into Peking's Imperial Palace Museum to steal Emperor Shi's jade Mahjong set, but winds up getting chased by a gang.
programme.sub-title: Operation INVADER at the Great Wall of China

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Look who is flying above New York; it's Superman! All he does is fly around, but the town is in a panic because of his performance. In the meantime, a lot of banks get robbed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin steals a statue called the Stone Child from the Metropolitan Art Museum; he and Fujiko make their getaway in a Cessna, but they crash at the Bermuda Triangle. They encounter a ghost ship at this grave of many ships and planes.
programme.sub-title: From the Ghost Ship with Love

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Foodie and gourmet aficionado Baron Gourmel says he wants to eat Lupin's brain. He claims he'd offer his own 70-million dollar jewelry collection to anyone who could capture Lupin. Fujiko hears of it and informs Lupin right away.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin III learns that his grandfather Arsène Lupin's secret treasures are buried in his grave. Lupin learns of its location with Fujiko's microfilm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are surrounded, as usual, as they are trying to escape after a jewelry theft. But somebody shoots at Zenigata and hits him dead on. Lupin learns of the even the next morning in the papers, and Fujiko and Goemon get implicated.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of the Duchy of Blanco has a one-of-a-kind gold coin of Hannibal hidden in his chest; well, Lupin and crew are after it. Amidst their scheming, Jigen is challenged to a duel with a man named Stoneman.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of France has run up a ridiculous tab with Maxim of Paris, and orders the Louvre Museum proprietor to sell a painting to cover his bill. But the proprietor doesn't want to let it go, and takes the painting out of the museum.
programme.sub-title: The Ultra Operation in the Train

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin recieves a letter about Marie Antoinette's jeweled crown, and sneaks into the palace of Versailles. A young man called Oscar appears, the sender of the letter.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin was told by Fujiko to steal a pistol of the Wilhem family worth 500 million pounds. Meanwhile, a man named Jim Benkei, a giant of a man who's stirred troubled in London, steals Jigen's favorite Magnum ...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the various jewels at the World Fair in Los Angeles. Lupin learns from Fujiko that a man named Harry Satler is also after the jewels, so he decides to go see who this guy is. The man he meets is a wizened old man…
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Looked at an Angel!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Pestered by Fujiko, Lupin has to steal a golden bed that was originally made by Louis XIV for Josephine. He makes a plan with Jigen and Goemon, but the owner of the bed, Morgan, is a formidable opponent who has WWII military experience.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Heike Clan and Minamoto Clan once battled on Devil's Head Island at the inland sea of Seto; Fujiko and Lupin go there to find out about the details behind the legend of the battle.
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of Demon's Head Island

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vivian dreams of becoming a star some day, but her auditions are a bust. She thinks of using Lupin to become famous; she makes Lupin engage in thievery, and informs reporters to be at the site to catch him in the act.
programme.sub-title: A Cat for You! Dried Bonito for Me!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Louis XIV and Marie Antoinette's Hope Diamond has brought much misfortune on its possessors. The diamond is now safeguarded by a maximum security device. Fujiko provokes Lupin to steal that diamond.
programme.sub-title: The Wedding Ring is a Cursed Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew go to a hot spring. Lupin and Jigen relax while Goemon trains at the cliffs. A girl manifests to Goemon and captures Goemon's heart. However, the girl is seeking the secret of his sword, for her swordsmith grandfather…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
